member.name: WrapMode
member.summary: The WrapMode enumeration specifies how repeated copies of an image are used to tile an area.

member.name: WrapMode.WrapModeTileFlipX
member.summary: Specifies that tiles are flipped horizontally as you move from one tile to the next in a row.

member.name: WrapMode.WrapModeTileFlipY
member.summary: Specifies that tiles are flipped vertically as you move from one tile to the next in a column.

member.name: WrapMode.WrapModeTileFlipXY
member.summary: Specifies that tiles are flipped horizontally as you move along a row and flipped vertically as you move along a column.

member.name: WrapMode.WrapModeClamp
member.summary: Specifies that no tiling takes place.
